text: s that begin before the cancer is diagnosed and continue for months or years.    - Some cancer treatments cause side effects months or years after treatment has ended.    - Six types of standard treatment are used:         - Surgery      - Radiation therapy      - Chemotherapy      - Cerebrospinal fluid diversion     - Observation     - Targeted therapy        - New types of treatment are being tested in clinical trials.     - Patients may want to think about taking part in a clinical trial.
